definition: to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law

sentences.english: These mass organizations shall act strictly according to law and protect the lawful rights and interests of the citizens.
sentences.chinese: 治安保衛組織應嚴格依法辦事，保護公民的合法權益。

sentences.english: If the debtor assigns its obligations, it shall go through relevant procedures.
sentences.chinese: 債務人轉移義務應依法辦理有關手續。

sentences.english: But this is the national statutory taxes, enterprises should pay taxes according to law.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這是國家法定的稅收，企業應納稅依法辦事。

sentences.english: The socialism legal perspective of Dong Biwu put its emphasis on the point of obeying the law.
sentences.chinese: 董必武的社會主義法制觀重點體現在依法辦事上。

sentences.english: The new law would criminalise oblivious as well.
sentences.chinese: 這一新法案將有可能連不知情者也一併法辦了。

sentences.english: 'We have to allow for the law to take its course, ' said Ahsan Iqbal, a spokesman for Mr.
sentences.chinese: “我們必須依法辦事，”謝里夫所在黨派發言人說。

sentences.english: For establishment of a job intermediary, administrative permission shall be applied for in accordance with law.
sentences.chinese: 設立職業中介機構，應當依法辦理行政許可。

sentences.english: China is a country under the rule of law. It abides by the law.
sentences.chinese: 中國是法制國家，我們依法辦事。

sentences.english: Article 28 A commodity price surveillance officer shall perform. his duties in accordance with the law.
sentences.chinese: 第二十八條物價檢查人員必須依法辦事。

sentences.english: The new law would criminalise the oblivious as well.
sentences.chinese: 這一新法案將有可能連不知情者也一併法辦了。
